answer:
Two doses of the chickenpox (varicella) vaccine are recommended for adults who have not had chickenpox disease.
You can find more information about the chickenpox vaccine here. 
- Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Two doses of the chickenpox (varicella) vaccine are recommended for adults who have not had chickenpox disease.

You can find more information about the chickenpox vaccine here.
- Immunization Nurse
question: My son did not get chicken pox as a child. He had the vaccination at school at about age 12. Does he need a booster vaccination now that he is almost 23?
question_variation_0: when should i have a booster vaccine
question_variation_1: when does he need booster vaccine
question_variation_2: when does a child need a booster vaccine
